Articles.Content:
I've had quite a lot of fun designing SEP spacecraft in realism overhaul. However, as soon as you start to scale things up, I end up having to use dozens of the largest solar panels available from the near future pack. Making them fit in a fairing has forced me to make ungodly infernal robotics contraptions, which would wobble, hit the spacecraft, and break the panels forcing me to relaunch ten times or more until I finally didn't break anything.

This got me thinking: there are procedural parts mods for practically every single part type except solar panels. It'd be great if there was a mod that did just that, where you could adjust the length and width of the solar panel, with the power and mass scaling proportionately to the area.

This would indeed be nice.

However, no procedural parts have animations and I don't think this would be possible unless they were static solar panels.
